alert.note: Alert for Franklin (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 11:47PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Jackson, northeastern Madison, southeastern Lincoln and southwestern Franklin Counties through 1230 AM CDT... At 1147 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Huntland, or 11 miles southwest of Winchester, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Huntland, New Market, Hytop, Lexie Crossroads, Plevna, Jericho, Elora, Estillfork, Maxwell and Larkin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
